name: Liquid Fusion
overview:
Liquid Fusion Inc is a privately held Federal “S”Corporation consisting of online media companies: Liquid Fusion (R) Records; Liquid Fusion: Film & Video; Liquid Fusion (R) American Clothing.

US Trademarks for Liquid Fusion (R):

  • Liquid Fusion (R) Records
  • Liquid Fusion (R) Band
  • Liquid Fusion (R) Film & Video
  • Liquid Fusion (R) Entertainment Services
  • Liquid Fusion (R) American Clothing

Liquid Fusion (R) Records is an online record label featuring original: rock / blues / funk / R&B / country / acoustic music. Since 2000, Liquid Fusion (R) Records is a GRAMMY AWARDs member media company. Brewer Shettles (Founder/CEO) is a GRAMMY AWARDS member as: Producer / Engineer / Writer / Guitarist.

Liquid Fusion (R) Band features rock / blues music. It has played in various NYC Rock Clubs both on its own as well as supporting other bands: Lions Den; B.B.King Blues Club; Mercury Lounge; Kenny’s Castaways.

Liquid Fusion (R) Film & Video features band video production; TV Producer Specials on MNN Cable TV NYNY.

Liquid Fusion (R) American Clothing offers creative T-Shirts for sale online.
